alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:45PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, Estill, northern Jackson, northern Rockcastle and western Lee Counties through 430 PM EST... At 344 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boone, or 13 miles north of Mount Vernon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Conway around 350 PM EST. Boone and Snider around 355 PM EST. Disputanta and Climax around 400 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Shirley, Morrill, Clover Bottom, Threelinks, Hisel, Kerby Knob, Locust Branch, Sandgap, Collingsworth, Eglon, Blackburn, Alcorn, Brazil, Blanton Flats, Jinks, Waneta, Foxtown, Drip Rock, Wagersville, Macedonia, Station Camp, Old Orchard, Arvel, Wind Cave, Lakes, Alumbaugh, Leighton, New Zion, Turkey Foot, Texola and Pryse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
